advancement.someassemblyrequired.obtain_: A Matter of Loaf and Bread
Cut a loaf of bread into slices using the Cutting Board and a Kitchen Knife
The Greatest Thing since Sliced Bread
Toast a slice of bread using the Redstone Toaster™
Create a Sandwich using the Sandwich Assembly Table
message.someassemblyrequired.full_sandwi: You cannot add any more items!
description.someassemblyrequired.sandwic: Sandwiches can be made using this block. Up to 16 ingredients can be placed on top, starting and ending with a bread slice. Sneak-right click with an empty hand to build your sandwich
description.someassemblyrequired.cutting: A block used to cut or chop food items
description.someassemblyrequired.redston: The Redstone Toaster™ can be used to toast bread and other food items. It does not require any fuel. It is recommended one does not try to toast metal, or submerge the toaster in water
description.someassemblyrequired.sticky_: A slightly less violent variant of the Redstone Toaster™
description.someassemblyrequired.kitchen: A tool used to cut ingredients on the cutting board
description.someassemblyrequired.bread_s: An ingredient essential for sandwiches. Much more hunger-efficient than a loaf of bread and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.toasted: A toasted slice of bread. Restores more hunger than a regular bread slice
description.someassemblyrequired.charred: Not quite as tasty as regular bread
description.someassemblyrequired.apple_s: A sliced food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole apple and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.golden_: A sliced food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole golden apple and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.enchant: A sliced food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole enchanted golden apple and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.chopped: A chopped food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole carrot and can be eaten faster
A chopped food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole golden carrot and can be eaten faster
A chopped food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole beetroot and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.mayonna: A bottle of mayonnaise. can be spread on a sandwich
description.someassemblyrequired.sweet_b: A bottle of jam which can be spread on a sandwich. Restores more hunger that plain sweet berries
description.someassemblyrequired.pork_cu: Small cuts of a porkchop, can be obtained using the cutting board
description.someassemblyrequired.bacon_s: Restores more hunger than pork cuts
description.someassemblyrequired.toasted: An edible form of crimson fungus. Can be cut on the cutting board
An edible form of warped fungus. Can be cut on the cutting board
description.someassemblyrequired.sliced_: A sliced food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole toasted crimson fungus and can be eaten faster
A sliced food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole toasted warped fungus and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.charred: Perhaps toasting it again will help?
description.someassemblyrequired.tomato: A vegetable that can be sliced or used to make ketchup
description.someassemblyrequired.tomato_: A sliced food item which is more hunger-efficient than a whole tomato and can be eaten faster
description.someassemblyrequired.ketchup: A bottle of ketchup. can be spread on a sandwich
description.someassemblyrequired.lettuce: A head of lettuce. Can be cut into leaves
A leaf of lettuce. More hunger-efficient than a whole head of lettuce
